title: Pool and spa health inspection certificates
dataVerified: Facility name, pool ID, health inspector, inspection date, chemical/safety compliance
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake pool certificates. Domain binding verifies health department. Public display requirement. Prevents disease outbreak (Legionella, cryptosporidium). Health code compliance.
